text: Motion
Motion
What are you up to, Fuyuko?

What?
Taking screenshots of Twesta.

The magazine went on sale today, right?
I'm checking out on how it was recieved.
Idol's make a living on public opinion after all.
Haha, shrewd as always.

"I really like Fuyu-chan's look!
It's wild how cool she looks even though she's so cute!"
Fufu, this one really gets it, don't they.
Hey, you should also take a look at this.
Hmm? Which one? Let's see...

"This person, while she is pretty cute,
Don't you you feel liek her style is getting stale?" ...
...Out of all of these, you chose to read that one?

Ah... No...!
That one was the first one that caught my eye ────

...Well, there are all sorts of people,
and they'll each react in their own way.
I know that much without you telling me.

Even if I try to show something a certain way,
there's not much I can control about how they percieve it.
And that's exactly why I'm looking at peoples reactions.
Like "What does the world think about Fuyu?"
Ah, I see.
...It's flattering, isn't it?
Eh?
Think about it.

This world is full of so many intersting things.
And even still there are people who support Fuyu.

Fuyu's fans are spending their time and money 
to come to events to cheer Fuyu on.

Among all of the other fun things they could be doing,
that they think "I want to support Fuyu."
Don't you think that's amazing?
Yeah, it certainly is.

So, I need to do whatever it takes
to give them back the "Fuyu" they deserve.
...Gathering information like this is just the first step.

You know, you've already become a Fuyuko
that your fans want to support.
......Fufu

Of course,
who do you think you're talking to?
That's what Fuyu was planning from the very start...!

As long as there's a single person
who will cheer Fuyu on...
I want to make them happy that they cheered for Fuyu.
I want to be thought of as an idol like that.

I'll do everything I can
to produce a Fuyuko like that.
Motion
